name: Slam Junk
description:
Try to beat every greasy food in a slippery sumo battle. 

Game made for the LowRez Jam 2020.

Using the Themes:

  • Hotdogs
  • Slippery

Arena: Throw your enemy from the arena to win,
beware that the trail you leave make the arena slippery.

Controls:

Arrow Keys or WASD to move.

Space bar to confirm.

Unfortunatelly I wasn't able to spend as much time as I hoped for,
but I'm really happy with how this little game turned out and I will try to
finish it in the upcoming weeks.
